leave

Class AdministratorLeaveRequestControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • leave.AdministratorLeaveRequestControl

  • public class AdministratorLeaveRequestControl
extends java.lang.Object
    The AdministratorLeaveRequestControl class provides functionality for administrators to manage and review leave requests. It allows viewing, approving, and declining pending leave requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AdministratorLeaveRequestControl(InitialDataLeaveRequest leaveData, InitialDataStaff staffData)
      Constructs an AdministratorLeaveRequestControl instance with the specified leave data and staff data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reviewPendingLeaveRequest(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Allows the administrator to review and update the status of a pending leave request.
      void viewPendingLeaveRequests()
      Displays all pending leave requests in a formatted table, including the requester's name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdministratorLeaveRequestControl

        public AdministratorLeaveRequestControl(InitialDataLeaveRequest leaveData,
                                        InitialDataStaff staffData)
        Constructs an AdministratorLeaveRequestControl instance with the specified leave data and staff data.
        Parameters:
        leaveData - The InitialDataLeaveRequest object containing all leave requests.
        staffData - The InitialDataStaff object containing staff information.

    • Method Detail

      • viewPendingLeaveRequests

        public void viewPendingLeaveRequests()
        Displays all pending leave requests in a formatted table, including the requester's name. If no pending requests are found, a message is displayed.

      • reviewPendingLeaveRequest

        public void reviewPendingLeaveRequest(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Allows the administrator to review and update the status of a pending leave request. The administrator can approve or decline the selected request.
        Parameters:
        scanner - The Scanner object for reading user input.
